Room.Name: Path Fork
Room.ShortDescription: You have reached a fork in the path you have been following.
Room.LongDescription: A gravel walkway leads east through a meadow, while the main path continues to the north and south. You are surrounded by a grove of trees which gets thicker to the north, while to the south the path narrows and makes it way between huge rocks and boulders. A steep rock face looks like it can be climbed, if you had climbing equipment.
